r.s: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.d: Abstracts parsing and rendering rules for Wiki markup in structured plain text.
r.n: * moved all parsing rules from Text/Wiki/Parse to Text/Wiki/Parse/Default (this will help separate entire parsing rule sets, e.g. BBCode) * changed Wiki.php to use the new Parse/Default directory as the default directory * fixed interwiki regex so that page names starting with : are not honored (it was messing up wikilinks with 2 colons in the text)
